text:
Serena Williams' baby girl flexes her biceps in precious picture after she gets her own Instagram account

The former Wimbledon Women's champion gave birth at the beginning of the month

Serena Williams shares incredible video of her entire pregnancy

Serena Williams has shared another precious picture of her newborn tot Alexis Alexis Olympia Ohanian Jr.

‌



The tennis champ, who welcomed her daughter with fiance Alexis Ohanian on September 1, proudly uploaded a shot of her baby girl appearing to flex her little biceps.

‌



"Biceps," 35-year-old Serena simply captioned it along with a flexing emoji.

‌



Her daughter is also wearing a cute babygro that reads 'smart and strong like my mama'.

Content cannot be displayed without consent

Content cannot be displayed without consent

‌



Little Alexis has now even got her own Instagram account - the very first post sees the adorable newborn resting a hand under her chin as she sleeps.

Serena first introduced Alexis to the world earlier this week with a video of her pregnancy journey.

View 4 Images Serena Williams shared the first picture of baby Alexis earlier this week (Image: Instagram)

‌



View 4 Images (Image: serenawilliams/Instagram)

Sharing the video, the new mum wrote: "Hello, world. Baby girl Alexis Olympia Ohanian Jr.

"Born: September 1, 2017. Weight: 6lb 14oz. Grand slam titles: 1."

‌



Serena Williams shares first picture of adorable baby girl she shares with fiancé Alexis Ohanian and announces her unusual name READ MORE :

View 4 Images Serena is currently World Number 4 despite being out of action on the court (Image: serenawilliams/Instagram)

View 4 Images She's expecting her first child (Image: Instagram)

Serena famously won her 23rd Grand Slam at the Australian Open while pregnant, and it was soon after the milestone that she announced she was temporarily retired from competitive tennis in order to focus on the impending arrival of her baby.

Article continues below

Serena and fiance, 33-year-old Reddit co-founder Alexis, announced the pregnancy back in April on her Snapchat, with a snap of the nine-time Wimbledon champion showing off her bump in a swimsuit, alongside the caption: "20 weeks."
title: Serena Williams' baby girl flexes her biceps in precious picture after she gets her own Instagram account
